page.title: 02OAKHAM IN RUTLAND
page.content: }Oakham is the market town of Rutland, which is now part of Leicestershire. {Rutland Water}lies at the heart of the district - a reservior the size of Lake Windermere. Oakham is 3 miles from the water and all its leisure facilities, while at the same time being ideally linked to major cities such as Leicester and Peterborough. Oakham has a population of 8,000 Some work in local industry, while others commute to near-by cities. The District Council Offices and Oakham School (an independent school) employ many more. There are 5 Primary Schools, a Middle School and a 6th Form College as well as a small hospital and other essential services. Oakham and its surrounding area has much to offer everybody.
